column2: After 7 hours of traveling and waiting, the kids and I are finally back safely in Manila. Can't wait to hit the sack! Good morning tweeple!
@LEAHDG @charinasarte @fabio_ide @frankbriones @cristallebelo @FierceDong @jmaxwell88 @miriamq Had a blast! Next time we should be complete!
Truee!  Epic! RT @fabio_ide: If you come home as happy as you leave, you had a good vacation.
After 2 hours of waiting at Kalibo International Airport, I'm finally boarding! Para lang kami nag Singapore sa haba ng biyahe! #sleepy
We must let go of the life we had planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us. - Joseph Campbell  http://t.co/jnvf4wfp
Worst decision ever! Should've stayed in and slept. 2-hour wait. #annoyed
@frankbriones yes! OMG. The flight is delayed. What else is new?  Should've stayed in and took the morning flight. #annoyed
Gosh I'll make it a point to never book early return flights unless I really have to. Don't wanna miss another flight ever again! #hassle
On a road trip. Thank you Shangri-La Boracay for the swift and organized transfer.  Gonna try to catch up on some Zzzz's. #disconap

We're coming up with an exciting holiday collection for stylish little girls to be sold at HOUSE OF LAUREL (Rockwell) starting next month.
That's when the LOVE COLLECTION was born. I'm sooo excited that the loves of my life are collaborating with @rajolaurel this holiday season!
I came up with a bright idea and called @rajolaurel. I told him that Lorin and Venice would like to design their own children's collection.
When Lorin and I made a special appearance on Project Runway Philippines, it was a big hit! Our episode became a trending topic worldwide!
At their young age, Lorin & Venice are already showing their creativity, passion in designing, styling and dress making. This inspired me.
My little girls love wearing my heels, playing with my make-up and raiding my closet when I'm around. They love fashion as much as I do!
